resources.string:
We gather for about 90-minutes as a group. During this time, we introduce ourselves, briefly discuss a verse or passage from the Bible, and participate in conversation topics like travel, gardening, pets, culture, food, or hobbies.
If you are searching for a community of friends and you want to gain more confidence in your conversational English, this group is a great place to start! Want more information? Call/text 403-389-6224 or email info@nbccalgary.com.
